This [assignment](https://sr320.github.io/course-fish546-2023/assignments/01-blast.html) is to take set of unknown sequences, and annotate them.

### Step 1. Download Software 

Navigate to the [NCBI blast downloads](https://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/blast/executables/blast+/LATEST/) page I tried to first download the `ncbi-blast-2.13.0+-win64.exe` file I also downloaded the [ncbi-blast-2.13.0+-x64-arm-linux.tar.gz](https://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/blast/executables/blast+/LATEST/ncbi-blast-2.13.0+-x64-arm-linux.tar.gz)

```{bash}
pwd
cd /Applications/bioinfo/
```

```{bash}
curl -O https://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/blast/executables/blast+/LATEST/ncbi-blast-2.13.0+-x64-macosx.tar.gz
tar -xf ncbi-blast-2.13.0+-x64-macosx.tar.gz
```
